name: ToupiCorp
description:
In this game, you're a spinnig top, facing waves and waves of invaders. Don't miss the collaborative mode, you won't succeed without a friend. 

This game was conceived by Polytechnique students during a 60-hour course on video game making with the Unity engine.  

Authors :  Mathieu Jacquemet ; Loïc Taleb ; David Ripayre 

Music : from Geometry Dash [Steam][AppStore][GPlay]
